newsitem.title: USA: Compaq cuts some notebook prices.
newsitem.headline: Compaq cuts some notebook prices.

text.p: Compaq Computer Corp said Monday it cut prices up to 14 percent on certain Armada notoebook products and introduced new models.
The price cuts, effective June 9, apply to four Armada notebook families -- the 1100, 1500, 4100 and 7700, Compaq said.

Compaq also announced new additions to its Armada 1500 and 4100 family of notebook products. The four new models include Intel Pentium processors with MMX technology, large displays and enhanced Smart Hard Drives.
